My manager would like some unit tests wrote for a J2EE app. These are
in my=
 opinion ad hoc test. But so be it. 

The application runs in WebSphere wit=
h a Oracle9i backend and connects
to MQ Series for internal/external queuin=
g. It polls a database table
that a Legacy application populates and there =
are no api for this app.

My questions are should I mock the inserts to the=
 legacy app database?
And use cactus from this point on to test the app? An=
d how do I test
the internal/external queuing? 

I hope this is the right p=
lace for these questions.

brolamar
